ValidationRule.description: This rule ensures that the Opportunity Lead Source is selected
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND($Profile.Name <> "System Administrator", $Profile.Name <> "Customer Success Manager", ISPICKVAL( Type ,"New Business"), IsWon, ISBLANK( TEXT(LeadSource )), ISBLANK( TEXT( Contact_method__c )))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please input a Lead Source and Contact Method before saving. If possible, also include any detail (e.g., which event the primary prospect attended.)
